events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and I want to return it for a refund immediately because I did not get what I paid for.
The issue described has been categorized under refund due to the customer's request for returning an incorrect item.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the incorrect item received by the customer.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to assist you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund quickly?
Here is my order number 789123 and I have attached a clear photo showing the wrong item that was shipped to me.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund and send you a prepaid label to return the incorrect item within the next 24 hours.
Thank you for the quick response and refund arrangement. I appreciate your help and look forward to resolving this soon.
The refund has been processed successfully and you should see the money back in your account within 3-5 business days.
We are checking in to confirm that you received the refund and to make sure everything is satisfactory on your end.
Since there have been no further issues reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support!
